tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_camera_footage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR,
  event_type VARCHAR,
  duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_camera_metadata (
    camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    footage_location STRING,
    recording_start TIMESTAMP,
    recording_end TIMESTAMP
  )

CREATE TABLE search_history (
    search_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id UUID,
    search_timestamp TIMESTAMP
  )

CREATE TABLE security_camera_footage (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_location VARCHAR,
  recorded_date TIMESTAMP,
  footage_path VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE security_camera_log (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  action_type VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_camera_users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR,
  password VARCHAR
)
CREATE TABLE security_camera_footage (id INT PRIMARY KEY, camera_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, location TEXT, footage_url TEXT)
CREATE TABLE camera_location (id INT PRIMARY KEY, camera_id INT, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE camera_status (id INT PRIMARY KEY, camera_id INT, status TEXT, last_checked TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE camera_alerts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, camera_id INT, alert_type TEXT, alert_time TIMESTAMP, details TEXT)

CREATE TABLE SecurityCameraFootageMetadata (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    duration INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CameraLocation (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CameraEventTypes (
    event_type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE UserAccessPermissions (
    user_id INT,
    camera_id INT,
    permission_level VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, camera_id)
)

CREATE TABLE UserActivityLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    access_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    activity_description TEXT
)
